FuncDef:
The sysname command configures a host name for an AP.
The undo sysname command restores the default host name for an AP.
By default, AP host name is HUAWEI.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a host name for an AP.When configuring a home name for an AP, do not use the following special characters:
\ " , ! @ [ ] '.
If these characters are used, the save-as function and NE explorer of an NMS are opened slowly after the name is synchronized to the NMS.
The value is a string of 1 to 246 case-sensitive characters in text format, spaces supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In the port extension system, a master manages multiple APs. To facilitate management and maintenance, you can run the sysname command to configure a host name for an AP.
Configuration Impact
The default host name of an AP is HUAWEI, and the prompt of the user view is <HUAWEI>. Changing the host name of the AP affects the prompt.
Precautions
In VS mode this command is supported only by admin VS.
